statements: SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_sales WHERE sales_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, sales_amount FROM pharmaceutical_sales WHERE sales_date = '2023-09-15';
SELECT DISTINCT product_name FROM pharmaceutical_sales WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT sales_id, product_name, sales_date FROM pharmaceutical_sales WHERE sales_date BETWEEN '2023-09-05' AND '2023-09-10';
SELECT product_name, sales_amount FROM pharmaceutical_sales ORDER BY sales_amount DESC;
SELECT sales_id, product_name, sales_date, sales_amount, customer_id FROM pharmaceutical_sales WHERE sales_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sales_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_sales WHERE product_name LIKE '%pain%' ORDER BY sales_date ASC;
SELECT sales_id, product_name FROM pharmaceutical_sales WHERE customer_id = 1001 OR customer_id = 1002 ORDER BY product_name ASC, sales_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales FROM pharmaceutical_sales GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_sales > 1000;
SELECT sales_date, COUNT(DISTINCT customer_id) AS unique_customers FROM pharmaceutical_sales GROUP BY sales_date HAVING unique_customers > 5 ORDER BY sales_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, quantity, total_price FROM sales_data WHERE unit_price > 100 ORDER BY total_price DESC;
SELECT location, gender, age FROM demographics WHERE income > 50000 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT AVG(income) FROM demographics GROUP BY occupation HAVING AVG(income) > 60000;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE total_price > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC, quantity ASC
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_name ORDER BY total_quantity DESC
SELECT location, gender, AVG(income) AS average_income FROM demographics GROUP BY location, gender HAVING AVG(income) > 50000
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' AND unit_price < 50 ORDER BY quantity DESC, unit_price ASC
SELECT age, occupation, COUNT(*) AS total_customers FROM demographics GROUP BY age, occupation ORDER BY total_customers DESC
SELECT sales_id, product_name, sales_amount, sales_date FROM SalesData;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, age FROM Customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT demo_id, demographic_group, location FROM Demographics WHERE income_range = 'High';
SELECT sales_id, product_name, sales_amount FROM SalesData ORDER BY sales_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM SalesData;
SELECT sales_id, product_name FROM SalesData WHERE sales_amount > 1000;
SELECT SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales FROM SalesData GROUP BY sales_date;
SELECT customer_name, age, address FROM Customers WHERE age >= 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT demo_id, income_range FROM Demographics WHERE demographic_group = 'Young Adults' ORDER BY demo_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sales_Data;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM Sales_Data WHERE sale_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, age, gender FROM Customers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, location FROM Customers WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT * FROM Sales_Data;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM Sales_Data WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, age FROM Customers WHERE age >= 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price, manufacturer FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT customer_name, location FROM Customers JOIN Demographics ON Customers.customer_id = Demographics.customer_id WHERE income_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_name, sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, age, gender, occupation FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT region_name, country, sales_manager FROM regions WHERE region_name LIKE '%West%';
SELECT customer_name, age, gender FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT category, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM products GROUP BY category HAVING AVG(price) > 100 ORDER BY avg_price DESC;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount, sale_date FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY sale_amount DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT region_name, country, COUNT(sale_id) AS num_sales FROM regions JOIN sales_data ON regions.region_name = sales_data.region_name GROUP BY region_name, country ORDER BY num_sales DESC;

SELECT c.customer_name, d.age_group, r.region_name FROM customers c JOIN demographics d ON c.customer_id = d.customer_id JOIN regions r ON c.customer_id = r.region_id WHERE d.income_group = 'High' AND r.country = 'USA' ORDER BY c.customer_name ASC;
